name: Joseph PARISH, Appellee, v. Martin HORN, Secretary Pennsylvania Department of Corrections and Donald T. Vaughn, Warden and S.C.I.-Graterford's Inmate Records Office Supervisor, Appellants

parties: Joseph PARISH, Appellee, v. Martin HORN, Secretary Pennsylvania Department of Corrections and Donald T. Vaughn, Warden and S.C.I.—Graterford’s Inmate Records Office Supervisor, Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of March, 2002, the order of the Commonwealth Court'is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
800 A.2d 294
Joseph PARISH, Appellee, v. Martin HORN, Secretary Pennsylvania Department of Corrections and Donald T. Vaughn, Warden and S.C.I.—Graterford’s Inmate Records Office Supervisor, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 20, 2002.
Reconsideration Denied May 24, 2002.
